name: QuantiModo Template App
description: Track any variable with Quantimodo Ionic App

APPS.description: An uppercase csv of apps currently hosted

MOODIMODO_WEB_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID generated from QuantiModo (for the app MOODIMODO)

MOODIMODO_WEB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client Secret generated from QuantiModo (for the app MOODIMODO).
